title: Specialty Cleaning
markdown:
# Specialty Cleaning

Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprays for Gyms

Electrostatic disinfectant spray has become a game-changer for gyms and fitness centers. With every company looking for ways to safely allow their customers and members back, gyms have found it particularly tough. So tough that staples in the industry, like Gold’s Gym, are being forced to file for bankruptcy. When patrons are covered in sweat and touching every piece of equipment, what can be done to disinfect the gym environment safely and quickly? Many gyms are turning to electrostatic disinfection as the answer.

Specialty Cleaning
Electrostatic Disinfectant Sprays for Gyms
Electrostatic disinfectant spray has become a game-changer for gyms and fitness centers. With every company looking for ways to safely allow their customers and members back, gyms have found it particularly tough. So tough that staples in the industry, like Gold’s Gym, are being forced to file for bankruptcy. When patrons are covered in sweat and touching every piece of equipment, what can be done to disinfect the gym environment safely and quickly? Many gyms are turning to electrostatic disinfection as the answer.
